#This file is autogenerated! Don't modify it directly!!!
portuguese_greenland_area_scripted_country_name = { #Terra Verde, historical
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            #TODO this isn't quite working yet - it might crash the game during start depending on your last save...?
            #NOT = {
    		#	any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		#}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:portuguese_language
					culture.language = language:portuguese_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:portuguese_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:portuguese_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:greenland_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }

    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:new_hampshire_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
portuguese_maine_area_scripted_country_name = { #Beira, after a portuguese province
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            #TODO this isn't quite working yet - it might crash the game during start depending on your last save...?
            #NOT = {
    		#	any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		#}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:portuguese_language
					culture.language = language:portuguese_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:portuguese_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:portuguese_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:maine_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }

    		#}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:portuguese_language
					culture.language = language:portuguese_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:portuguese_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:portuguese_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:missouri_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
portuguese_iowa_area_scripted_country_name = { #Aiola, transliteration of the native word
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            #TODO this isn't quite working yet - it might crash the game during start depending on your last save...?
            #NOT = {
    		#	any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		#}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:portuguese_language
					culture.language = language:portuguese_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:portuguese_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:portuguese_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:iowa_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }

            #TODO this isn't quite working yet - it might crash the game during start depending on your last save...?
            #NOT = {
    		#	any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		#}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:portuguese_language
					culture.language = language:portuguese_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:portuguese_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:portuguese_language
					}
    		}
    	}

    		}
    	}

    		#	any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		#}

					overlord ?= {

					}

portuguese_central_plains_area_scripted_country_name = { #Campos Limpos, means open/clean fields, akin to Mato Grosso
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            #TODO this isn't quite working yet - it might crash the game during start depending on your last save...?
            #NOT = {
    		#	any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		#}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:portuguese_language
					culture.language = language:portuguese_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:portuguese_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:portuguese_language
					}
    		}
    	}

    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:central_plains_area
    		}
    	}

    	location_trigger = {

    	}
    }
portuguese_xalisco_area_scripted_country_name = { #Salisco, modern name, trnaslated; could also be Guadalarrara
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            #TODO this isn't quite working yet - it might crash the game during start depending on your last save...?
            #NOT = {
    		#	any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		#}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:portuguese_language
					culture.language = language:portuguese_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:portuguese_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:portuguese_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:xalisco_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }

    		#	any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		#}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:portuguese_language
					culture.language = language:portuguese_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:portuguese_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:portuguese_language
					}
    		}

    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:hawaii_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
portuguese_cascadia_area_scripted_country_name = { #Cascadia, unchanged
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            #TODO this isn't quite working yet - it might crash the game during start depending on your last save...?
            #NOT = {
    		#	any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		#}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:portuguese_language
					culture.language = language:portuguese_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:portuguese_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:portuguese_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:cascadia_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }

    		#}

					culture.language = language:portuguese_language

						court_language = language:portuguese_language
					}

					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:sao_paulo_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
portuguese_santa_catarina_area_scripted_country_name = { #Santa Catarina, historical
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            #TODO this isn't quite working yet - it might crash the game during start depending on your last save...?
            #NOT = {
    		#	any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		#}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:portuguese_language
					culture.language = language:portuguese_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:portuguese_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:portuguese_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:santa_catarina_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }

    		#}

					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:portuguese_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:portuguese_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:south_georgia_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
portuguese_charcas_area_scripted_country_name = { #Charcas, historical name
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            #TODO this isn't quite working yet - it might crash the game during start depending on your last save...?
            #NOT = {
    		#	any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		#}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = language:portuguese_language
					culture.language = language:portuguese_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:portuguese_language
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.language = language:portuguese_language
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:charcas_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }

    		#	any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		#}

					court_language = language:portuguese_language
					culture.language = language:portuguese_language
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = language:portuguese_language
					}
					overlord ?= {

    		}
    	}
